<figure><img src="https://s.yimg.com/os/creatr-uploaded-images/2025-12/ced0c170-dd13-11f0-b394-1dea3c7b6af3" data-crop-orig-src="https://s.yimg.com/os/creatr-uploaded-images/2025-12/ced0c170-dd13-11f0-b394-1dea3c7b6af3" style="height:5464px;width:8192px;" data-uuid="567d03d5-3da6-3093-9e05-86da6ff67bc2"><figcaption>picture alliance via Getty Images</figcaption></figure>
<p>The Lego Group is hosting its first-ever press conference at <a data-i13n="cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/big-tech/ces-2026-preview-what-were-expecting-from-techs-biggest-conference-in-january-120000768.html"><ins>CES 2026</ins></a> – but what the company is going to announce remains a mystery. While the huge toy brick creators haven&#39;t given any hints as to what they&#39;ll be showcasing, the possibilities run the gamut from new video games to Formula 1 race cars.</p>
<p>Here&#39;s how you can watch Lego&#39;s presentation at CES, and what we might expect to see.</p>
<span id="end-legacy-contents"></span><h2 id="jump-link-how-to-watch-the-lego-groups-ces-2026-press-conference">How to watch The Lego Group&#39;s CES 2026 press conference</h2>
<p>The Lego CES press conference is scheduled for Monday, January 5 at 1PM ET. While Lego and the Consumer Technology Association haven&#39;t yet provided the details, we expect that the press conference will be available as a livestream. Once the details are confirmed, we&#39;ll update this post to confirm them. But if a livestream isn&#39;t immediately available, the Engadget team will be liveblogging the Lego presser and posting timely details.</p>
<h2 id="jump-link-what-to-expect">What to expect</h2>
<p>Thus far, Lego hasn&#39;t shared any public info about its CES plans, so we&#39;re largely in the dark as to what to expect. At CES 2025, for instance, the toy production giant <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Sony;elmt:;cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=15919d69-aefa-41ae-a977-fdcae58a803c&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=d02a28a6-f21c-46c9-a5e0-dcff1b13d26a&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Sony&amp;linkText=partnered+with+Sony&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAQs3a2Z1PhL56xFcuMNdyyapDTHLTHqYGtaTOO8GGiNC&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sony.com%2Fen%2FSonyInfo%2FNews%2FPress%2F202501%2F25-001E%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.sony.com/en/SonyInfo/News/Press/202501/25-001E/"><ins>partnered with Sony</ins></a> to announce the animated Lego Horizon Adventures online game. As such, Lego may spend some time talking up its new 2026 game, <em>Lego Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight</em>. The company may also give some stage time to its <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:LEGO;elmt:;cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=d02a28a6-f21c-46c9-a5e0-dcff1b13d26a&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=LEGO&amp;linkText=Lego+Group+F1+Academy+racing+car&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAZZAPNff_LZ-W1eC2oDZCbHdkbJhF7su-Jt8P6I31Y0I&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Faboutus%2Fnews%2F2025%2Fdecember%2Ffast-work-designing-the-lego-group-s-new-f1-academy-racing-car-and-a-lego-set-to-match" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.lego.com/en-us/aboutus/news/2025/december/fast-work-designing-the-lego-group-s-new-f1-academy-racing-car-and-a-lego-set-to-match"><ins>Lego Group F1 Academy racing car</ins></a>, though that too would be more about brand building than consumer products.</p>
<p>And given Lego&#39;s focus on the environment, the company may discuss its efforts to <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:LEGO;elmt:;cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=d02a28a6-f21c-46c9-a5e0-dcff1b13d26a&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=LEGO&amp;linkText=reach+its+2032+ecological+goals&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAfqwZIEwgIxGnnpuucjUHpHHfAQLKZ0DtQyRGrKkcx3a&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Faboutus%2Fnews%2F2023%2Fseptember%2Fthe-lego-group-remains-committed-to-make-lego-bricks-from-sustainable-materials" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.lego.com/en-us/aboutus/news/2023/september/the-lego-group-remains-committed-to-make-lego-bricks-from-sustainable-materials"><ins>reach its 2032 ecological goals</ins></a>, including making its <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:LEGO;elmt:;cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=d02a28a6-f21c-46c9-a5e0-dcff1b13d26a&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=LEGO&amp;linkText=Lego+bricks+more+sustainable&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAWgN-uCnapLMZY4HY8HN6QCBWLgo5skghWWH9q40MENb&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Faboutus%2Fnews%2F2024%2Fmarch%2Fmaking-lego-bricks-more-sustainable-" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.lego.com/en-us/aboutus/news/2024/march/making-lego-bricks-more-sustainable-"><ins>Lego bricks more sustainable</ins></a> and reducing carbon emissions by 37%.</p>
<p>While there are plenty of <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:LEGO;elmt:;cpos:6;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=d02a28a6-f21c-46c9-a5e0-dcff1b13d26a&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=LEGO&amp;linkText=new+Lego+sets+for+2026&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAe_JjA1A1UFKg28RSrCDFeqiWrO3YNcOfX7_hjhhXlEC&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fcategories%2Fcoming-soon" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.lego.com/en-us/categories/coming-soon"><ins>new Lego sets for 2026</ins></a>, however, this is CES, not Toy Fair. So we&#39;re assuming that the company will be showcasing something that&#39;s more tech-centric. Stay tuned.</p>This article originally appeared on Engadget at https://www.engadget.com/gaming/how-to-watch-the-first-ever-lego-ces-2026-press-conference-live-130005307.html?src=rss
